0.text: Innate: Hecarim gains  bonus attack damage equal to 12% − 24% (based on level) of his  bonus movement speed.
Active: Hecarim cleaves his glaive around himself, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies, reduced to 60% against  minions.

1.text: If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with Rampage, he gains a buff for 8 seconds, stacking up to two times, with the duration refreshing on subsequent damaging hits. The buff increases the damage of Rampage by 2% (+ 3% per 100 bonus AD) and reduces the base cooldown by 1, up to a 4% (+ 6% per 100 bonus AD) damage increase and a reduction in 2 seconds of the base cooldown at two stacks.

0.text: Active: Hecarim surrounds himself with the Spirit of Dread for 4 seconds, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies every second.

1.text: While Spirit of Dread is active, Hecarim is  healed for 30% (+ 2.5% of 100 bonus AD) of the post-mitigation damage dealt to enemies within the area, reduced to 15% (+ 1.25% of 100 bonus AD) for damage dealt by allies. The healing is capped against  minions and  monsters.

0.text: Active: Hecarim becomes  ghosted and gains  25% − 65% (based on time active) bonus total movement speed for 4 seconds.

1.text: Hecarim's next basic attack during this time gains 50 − 250 (based on distance traveled)  bonus range and causes him to  dash towards the target's direction,  revealing them for 1 second. If the target remains nearby during the dash, the bonus movement speed is consumed and Hecarim  knocks them back 250 − 450 (based on distance traveled) units, though not through terrain,  stuns them for 0.25 seconds, and deals them modified physical damage, increased by 0% − 100% (based on distance traveled).

2.text: Devastating Charge  resets Hecarim's  basic attack timer and can  critically strike for (75% +  35%) AD bonus physical damage.

3.text: Hecarim can cast any of his abilities during the dash. Devastating Charge's duration is paused during  Onslaught of Shadows.

0.text: Active: Hecarim  dashes with  displacement immunity to the target location and summons 5 spectral riders in an arrow formation that charge alongside him in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in their path and  revealing them for 2.5 seconds.

1.text: Upon arrival, he  fears nearby enemies for 0.75 − 2 (based on distance traveled) seconds, and gradually  slows them by up to 99% over the duration. The slow's strength cannot be reduced and is based on how far the affected units are from Hecarim, having no slow at all from very close range.

2.text: The wave of spectral riders travels independently of Hecarim and will always charge at the same distance. Onslaught of Shadows will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
